title: Salesforce | MTS | Hyderabad
content:

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  ~43.5 LPA(First Year) ~42 LPA(2nd Year)

Am i being lowballed? i feel the they could have offer more stocks and 15% performance bonus
